file.title: Working With Passwords
file.bullet: When we create a user record in our database, we want to make sure the password is hashed before it is stored.
When a user tries to log in, we will try to verify the submitted password against the hash we have stored in our database.

In order to implement this, we'll use the BCrypt algorithm to hash passwords. We can find an implementation of bcrypt through this library:
